person.persName: Elijah F. Adkins (Whitley County jailer, postmaster, and blacksmith)

body.p: Residence: Williamsburg, Whitley County, KY. A Kentucky-born blacksmith. Appointed postmaster of Whitley Courthouse, Whitley County, 13 June 1856. Jailer of Whitley County in 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Williamsburg town, p. 75.
